description: GenoMAXÂ² Painpoints Dictionary - Maps user symptoms to biological targets and actionable intents

fatigue.label: Fatigue
fatigue.notes: Persistent fatigue often signals underlying metabolic or hormonal imbalance.

sleep_issues.label: Sleep Issues
sleep_issues.notes: Sleep problems often stem from stress, irregular schedules or stimulant use.

hair_loss.label: Hair Loss
hair_loss.notes: Hair loss can signal hormonal or nutritional deficiencies and chronic stress.

low_libido.label: Low Libido
low_libido.notes: Reduced libido is often linked to hormonal changes, stress, fatigue and weight gain.

weight_gain.label: Weight Gain
weight_gain.notes: Unexplained weight gain can result from hormonal changes and cortisol-related stress.

weight_loss.label: Weight Loss
weight_loss.notes: Unintentional weight loss may indicate metabolic or digestive issues and often warrants evaluation.

focus_issues.label: Difficulty Focusing
focus_issues.notes: Brain fog and focus issues are often related to poor sleep, stress, hormonal changes and blood sugar swings.

stress.label: High Stress
stress.notes: Chronic stress elevates cortisol, causing weight gain, fatigue, acne and other issues.

skin_issues.label: Skin Issues
skin_issues.notes: Skin health can reflect stress and hormones (cortisol spikes oil production and acne).

digestive_issues.label: Digestive Issues
digestive_issues.notes: Stress and diet strongly affect digestion via the brain-gut axis.

joint_pain.label: Joint / Muscle Pain
joint_pain.notes: Chronic stress triggers cortisol-driven inflammation that can worsen joint pain.

headaches.label: Headaches
headaches.notes: Headaches often stem from stress, dehydration, poor sleep or dietary triggers.

mood_swings.label: Mood Swings / Anxiety
mood_swings.notes: Mood changes and anxiety can arise from hormonal shifts, inflammation or nutrient deficiencies.

blood_sugar_fluctuations.label: Blood Sugar Fluctuations
blood_sugar_fluctuations.notes: Cravings and energy crashes often reflect poor diet or metabolic imbalance.

poor_recovery.label: Poor Recovery
poor_recovery.notes: Slow recovery from exercise or illness can indicate nutritional gaps or hormonal imbalances.
